channel.title: MESG Marketplace Beta: now live on the mainnet
channel.description:
The MESG Foundation is excited to announce the release of the beta version of our decentralized MESG Marketplace It’s live and ready to use now: https://marketplace.mesg.com

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/mesg-marketplace-beta-now-live-on-the-mainnet/
